page.title: 19LOCAL PUBLIC TRANSPORT
page.content: LOCAL PUBLIC TRANSPORT These passages contain details of two railway stations;RIDDLESDOWN & KENLEY, which are both situated in our area GRID REFERENCE:05320159.Riddlesdown is itself situated about 12 miles south from the centre of London.Both passages contain the facilities avaliable at the stations.The railway stations are used mainly by local business_people and shoppers. Riddlesdown station is situated 2 miles from the centre of Purley.It is minute compared with Victoria & London Bridge.The station consists of a small but comfortable waiting room,2 seperate W.C's,2 platforms & 2 ticket offices.The East Grinstead line passes throw the station.Between 50 & 60 people use it each day.We found three major problems with the station,they are as follows:
